name: Juniper
description: Without juniper, there is no gin. When distilled, it adds a medicinal flavor with pine notes. Berries are wild-harvested on mountain slopes.

name: Coriander
description: Coriander seeds have a citrusy, nutty flavor, essential in gin and cooking. They balance spice blends with their bright, aromatic notes.

name: Lemon Myrtle
description: Lemon myrtle is an Australian native with intense citrus aroma. Its leaves are used in teas, desserts, and savory dishes for zesty flavor.
